card.name: Miria, the Living Woods
card.text: {R}{G}, {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It is still a land.

card.name: Ali and Rosa, the Flames of Passion
card.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, the first creature you cast on your second main phase cost {1} less. {2}{W/R}, {T}: Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Serena, Goldnight Angel
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 2 life. {2}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Alycia, Archmage of Goldnight
card.text: Whenever a creature would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. {R/W}, {T}: Target Human gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vyk, Thunder-Thrash Elder
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Viashino creature token. {2}{B}{G}: Viashino creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Ildren, Hemlock Packmaster
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Viashino creature token. {2}{B}{G}: Viashino creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Teren, of Benalia
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, you may pay {X}{X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Soldier creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Zarkuul, Font of Predation
card.text: Creatures you control without Devour have Devour 1. (As the creature comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. It comes into play with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever a creature you control would be devoured, you may move all +1/+1 counters from that creature to the creature that would devour it, then devour it

card.name: Zhu Long, Jeskai Ascendant
card.text: {3}, {T}: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast from your hand this turn gains rebound. (Exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Blightpeddler Koss
card.text: {1}: Damage dealt by a source of your choice can't be prevented this turn. {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Blightpeddler Koss deals 2 damage to target player.

card.name: Dolorae, Sisters of Sorrow
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Dreadlord of Jhess
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, return it to its owner's hand unless any player pays 3 life.

card.name: Jagoda, Outland Druid
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, you may have target creature you control get +2/+2 or gain hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Logos, Empyreal Arbiter
card.text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Choose one — • Target creature can't attack or block this turn. • Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. • You gain 3 life.

card.name: Marat, Vis Collector
card.text: {U}{B}{R}, {T}: Tap target creature you don't control. It gets -1/-1 until end of turn and does not untap during its controller's next untap step. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if they control one or more tapped creatures, put a blood counter on Marat, Vis Collector. Remove a blood counter from Marat: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Tunor, Windcaller
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}, Exile a spell you control: Tunor, Windcaller deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Aterprin the Shelterer
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if it didn't enter from the graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on a creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Bracwen, the Beguiler
card.text: You may choose not to untap Bracwen, the Beguiler during your untap step. {T}: Put a verse counter on Bracwen. {2}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost of X or less for as long as Bracwen remains tapped, where X is the number of verse counters on him.

card.name: Disya, Miracle Worker
card.text: {X}{G}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library. Sacrifice that permanent at end of turn.

card.name: Eschaton
card.text: At the beginning of your first upkeep, create a 3/2 red Devil creature token. At the beginning of your end step, Eschaton deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Evalia, Heir of Avemarc
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, create a 4/4 green Warrior creature token tapped and attacking. Exile it at end of combat.

card.name: Ozge, Stewmaster
card.text: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card this turn. If it has converted mana cost 2, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Skane, Dark Counselor
card.text: {X}, {T}: Put the top X cards of your library into your graveyard. Target player loses 1 life for each card type among cards put into your graveyard this way.

card.name: Thyrus, Lineaologist
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}. if you do, choose a permanent you control and reveal the top card of your library. If that card shares a card type with the chosen permanent, put it into your hand.

card.name: Tsimisha, Ancient Guardian
card.text: {B}{G}{W}, {T}: Choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Yilan, Nest Keeper
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create a 1/1 black Snake creature token. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are seven or more creature cards in your graveyard, draw a card.

card.name: Mnemon the Savant
card.text: Whenever you draw a card except the first card you draw during your draw step, you gain 1 life. {2}{U}{B}, {T}, Pay 3 life: Target player discards a card at random. If it's a land card, draw a card. Activiate this ability only on your turn.
